description:
Aston Health is seeking a Regional Vice President of Business Development for the Tampa area!

The Regional Vice President of Business Development will be Responsible to ensure achievement of budgeted overall occupancy, skilled mix and targeted activity outcomes for assigned market. Consulates field Admissions Director and External Care Coordinator for facility team members for assigned to strategic markets (overnight travel may be required.) Provides on-site coaching, support and training for Admission team members. Manages and monitors standard process for all customer referrals and admissions. Manages the development and implementation of strategic and outcome-oriented Marketing Plans for assigned markets. Manages external and internal admissions coverage for assigned centers, and may provide coverage as needed. Ensures that all team members for assigned markets exhibit a sense of urgency.

Who We Are

The mission of our company is to enlist qualified personnel who will personalize the wellness journey by providing experiences that are designed around the needs of each individual. We are dedicated to promoting better quality of life and transform ordinary expectations into extraordinary outcomes.

QUALIFICATIONS of the VP of Business Development:

EDUCATION / EXPERIENCE:

· 2 years in external healthcare sales required. Experience in multi-site LTC sales preferred.

· 5-10 years’ experience in the healthcare industry required and regional healthcare sales management experience preferred.

· Valid drivers’ license and access to reliable vehicle for daily use, required. Ability to travel overnight for training and meeting events.

· Ability to travel to service sites and potential markets, as needed, with occasional overnight stay required.

· Bachelor’s degree preferred.

Why Join Us

· Competitive Compensation.

· Great Benefits Package.

· Engaging Work Atmosphere.

· Innovative Training Programs.

· Excellent Growth Opportunities.

· And So Much More!

RESPONSIBILITIES of the VP of Business Development:

· Position encompasses all expectations and responsibilities of the Regional Directors of Business Development and Admissions Directors position for multiple centers and markets, as assigned.

· Provides coverage for Vice President of Sales and Marketing, as needed.

· Participates in corporate initiatives and committees, as assigned.

· Facilitates sales training sessions and/or field-based sales coaching focused on the changing needs and challenges unique to each market or shared within the long-term care profession.

· Provides support and training to Admissions Directors and Liaison team members, as assigned.

TRAVEL:

· Approximately 90% local travel is expected for this position

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer.
